name: Watermelon Agua Fresca
description: This is a drink served throughout Mexico. It is made with several different fruits. This is a watermelon drink.
directions: Puree the watermelon and water in a blender until smooth.
Add sugar to taste. Cut the lime slices in half.
Place a half lime slice into each of 8 glasses along with 3 mint leaves.
Crush with a cocktail muddler, then fill each glass with ice. Pour in the watermelon agua fresca, and stir before serving.
